thread.title: CHECK IT OUT: Here are your pictures of the Northern Lights from across East Texas!
thread.title_full: CHECK IT OUT: Here are your pictures of the Northern Lights from across East Texas!

author: Reagan Roy
title: CHECK IT OUT: Here are your pictures of the Northern Lights from across East Texas!
text: TYLER, Texas â€” As we get closer to the peak of our sun's [11-year solar cycle](/article/weather/texas-northern-lights/285-3f507e57-4884-41d2-8072-7edac00ff46f), solar flares, sun spots, prominences and coronal mass ejections become more likely. It's these coronal mass ejections (CME) that are famous for causing the [Aurora Borealis](/video/news/local/northern-lights-shine-over-texas-panhandle/285-4d1b5c62-6604-49cc-9225-bfb68e4b7b99) to erupt in the sky across our northern latitudes. Just a few days ago, on Oct. 8, our sun produced one of those CMEs -- a big one! This severe solar storm sent a cloud of plasma and charged particles racing directly toward our Earth. NOAA defines this one as a G4-level storm. That's only one level away from the most severe level of G5. The storm arrived Oct. 10, and will last through the first part of the weekend. It's the kind of geomagnetic storm that can do damage to communication satellites, GPS devices and other electronic infrastructure but also produce a tremendous display of the [Northern Lights](/video/news/local/northern-lights-shine-over-texas-panhandle/285-4d1b5c62-6604-49cc-9225-bfb68e4b7b99). Here are your pictures from across East Texas: OCTOBER 2024: Northern Lights across East Texas If you have a picture you'd like to share, email it to us news@cbs19.tv or weather@cbs19.tv. DID YOU KNOW? In addition to the live stream, watch the latest from CBS19 on-demand, along with additional programming from our partners at TEGNA (like [Verify](/verify), "Murder at My Door" and "In the News") and [Locked On Sports](/), plus special collections from CBS19 like Under the Lights, Hooked on East Texas and CBS19 Originals. DOWNLOAD ON APPLE TV Learn more about the [free CBS19+ app in the Apple TV App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/kare-11-minneapolis-st-paul/id568147907?platform=appleTV) and download directly from your Apple TV device. Search for CBS19 East Texas News in your television's app store to add CBS19+.
